Hi there! [b:2sjfp3pu]Brettbixler[/b:2sjfp3pu] already posted a similar question some time ago, but nobody answered, so I'll try again:

In the web-version, in the ask/tell-section, there seems to be a problem with the if-script. Every time I try to type in an "if"-premise in the "ask"-section, the data gets erased as soon as I hit save or enter the game. Anybody out there who knows how to get around this?

Also, as Brettbixler noted, in the "print-message-box" in the "ask"-section, the only way to make the text stay, is if you type it in directly in the code view-box. Not that big of a deal, just puzzling.

Are there any mac-users out there who knows a reliable (and preferably free) way to get to use the desk-top version of Quest on their mac?

Thanks, and thank you so much to the developers for this incredibly cool platform!

Christian.
